attributes.action: Give more help to mental health
attributes.background: As someone suffering from mental health I believe there is not enough help in the uk with funding I have now been waiting 6 months for a new mental health support worker

rejection.details: In any case, petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you would like the Government to give more help to mental health, such as providing more funding.
